title: Righteous Foods
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Billed as "hip health food" American-style restaurant, this place offers many veg choices including grain dishes, salads, and soups. Large detox (juice) and retox (alcohol) menus. Vegan items aren't labeled, so ask. Limited parking. Since fall-2014.
